issue.title: [CF 1498] Change font?
issue.body:
This is a great add on! The only issue is my vision is pretty terrible and the font makes it very difficult to read. Could we get an option to change the font via the shared lib that's out there? 


> Posted by CurseForge user mobilehypo12631 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1498 | Raw

comments.body:
You already can. See the Text Layouts settings in the general tab of the settings.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
